title: Beautiful 4-bedroom Luxury Home w/3-car Garage, POOL & Tropical Oasis
posting_body: ['Beautiful 3,800 Sqft luxury home for rent in Henderson - just minutes from large park, CSN Henderson campus, shopping center and freeway access.', 'Boasting 3,800 Sqft with 4 bedroom+Lofts, 2.5 bathrooms and a 3-car garage.', 'Traditional layout with large formal living/dining room and a separate family room featuring ceramic tile floors, neutral colors and upgraded light fixtures.', 'Fabulous gourmet kitchen with island, pantry, granite countertops and S/S appliances.', 'Den/office on first floor, and a giant bonus loft/game-room upstairs.', 'All 4 bedrooms are upstairs and feature carpeting and ceiling fans.', 'Luxurious master suite with high vaulted ceilings, huge walk-in closet and ceiling fans.', 'Dual sinks in master bathroom with tub/shower combo.', 'Guest bedrooms share a full bath.', 'Inviting backyard oasis with lush tropical landscaping, artificial grass, covered patio and a sun-drenched Pool.', 'Home is also listed for sale ($749,000)', '6-month or 1-year lease.', 'Available after 7/14/2022', 'Rent: $3,000/month', 'Security deposit: $3,300', 'Cleaning fee: $400', 'Pet deposit: $300/pet', 'App.fee: $50/person', 'To qualify: 3x Rent in monthly income, excellent rental history and 620+ FICO credit score', 'Tel:', 'show contact info', '***For fastest reply, please leave a detailed message.', 'Thank you', 'Showings available MO-SAT by appointment', 'Anthem - Green Valley - Henderson area leasing specialists', 'American Realty and Property Management', 'Keyword: Outskirts']
